Uses of Class
Steganography.Exceptions.CannotEncodeException

  • Packages that use CannotEncodeException 
    Package Description
    Steganography.Logic
    The Steganography.Logic package contains all the classes used to handle the steganography, encryption and compression processes (and more...) in the Steganography package.

    • Uses of CannotEncodeException in Steganography.Logic

      Methods in Steganography.Logic that throw CannotEncodeException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      abstract void BaseSteganography.encode​(byte[] message, java.io.File output)
      Encodes a byte array into a cover image.
      abstract void BaseSteganography.encode​(java.io.File doc, java.io.File output)
      Encodes a document file into a cover image.
      void GifSteganography.encode​(byte[] message, java.io.File output)
      Calls the GifSteganography.writeHeader(byte[]) to write the message header into the gif stego image, then encodes the message to hide using GifSteganography.hideByte(byte) byte by byte, then saves the stego gif image using GifSequenceWriter
      void GifSteganography.encode​(java.io.File doc, java.io.File output)
      Calls the GifSteganography.writeHeader(byte[]) to write the file header into the gif stego image, then encodes the file to hide using GifSteganography.hideByte(byte) byte by byte, then saves the stego gif image using GifSequenceWriter
      void ImageInImageSteganography.encode​(java.io.File img, java.io.File output)
      Calls ImageSteganography.writeHeader(byte[]) to write the the image header to the stego image, then encodes the image using ImageInImageSteganography.hidePixel(int, int) pixel per pixel, then saves the stego image.
      void ImageSteganography.encode​(byte[] message, java.io.File output)
      Calls BaseSteganography.setHeader(byte[]) to write the message header to the stego image, then encodes the message to hide using ImageSteganography.hideByte(byte, int, int, byte) byte by byte, then saves the stego image.
      void ImageSteganography.encode​(java.io.File doc, java.io.File output)
      Calls BaseSteganography.setHeader(File) to write the header to the file header to the stego image, then encodes the file to hide using ImageSteganography.hideByte(byte, int, int, byte) byte by byte, then saves the stego image.
      (package private) byte[] BaseSteganography.setHeader​(byte[] message)
      Sets the class BaseSteganography.header field with information about a message to embed in the image.
      (package private) byte[] BaseSteganography.setHeader​(java.io.File file)
      Sets the class BaseSteganography.header field with information about a file document to embed in the image.
